full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Invitation to Bid: BPM020912 - Atlassian Software Solutions
#### Solicitation Overview
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) has issued a solicitation for the provision of Atlassian Software Solutions renewal or equivalent. This procurement is open to all interested suppliers who can provide the required solutions.

#### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** SSC-24-00025706:T
*   **Solicitation Number:** BPM020912/25706
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-02-20
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-01T14:00:00 (EST)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **G-SIN:** N7030AG
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
*   **End User Entities:** Shared Services Canada

#### Key Imperatives

*   **Security:** No security requirement
*   **Proposal Closing Date:** March 1, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST 
*   **Bidder Inquiries:** Suppliers can inquire or submit emails to tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca
*   **P2P Portal Access:** [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public)

#### Communication Contact
If you have any questions or concerns, you may reach out to Eric Lavigne at tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca 343-541-8756, or by writing a regular mail to 180 Kent Ottawa, K1J 4A8  Canada.

[The contracting agency has the right to accept or reject any or all bids. This announcement is subject to change. Mandatory documents and more details are available at the Sustainable Procurement Gateway: https://gsnssc.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.]

#### Request for Proposal:

The SSC notice with the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents is available on their website.

#### Technical Appendices: 
[submission ought to document WILL be kept in either contracting entity address]

  Please reply to this material immediately because only 11 days are supposed to arrive. Note we require services ASAP.

In this response, correct asap ASAP to as soon as possible, answer each question thoroughly and follow the
